channel.title: Universal Door Method?
channel.description:
Hey guys, does anyone know of a universal door handler anyone has made? Or any servers that have it? I'm spreading out my server world-wide so its more RS-like. And its a pain in the butt to program 4-5 doors just to move or spawn a couple of npcs. =\
Rep++ if anyone can help out.
